data.title: Elliði live score, schedule & player stats
data.meta_description: Elliði live score, fixtures, player ratings and statistics.
data.text:
Elliði live scores, players, season schedule and today’s results are available on Sofascore.

Elliði next match

Elliði will play the next match against Augnablik Kópavogur on Aug 25, 2024, 2:00:00 PM UTC in 3. deild.

When the match starts, you will be able to follow Augnablik Kópavogur vs Elliði live score, standings, minute by minute updated live results and match statistics.

We may have video highlights with goals and news for some Elliði matches, but only if they play their match in one of the most popular football leagues.

Elliði previous match

Elliði previous match was against Hviti Riddarinn in 3. deild, the match ended with result 3 - 4 (Hviti Riddarinn won the match).

Elliði fixtures tab is showing the last 100 football matches with statistics and win/draw/lose icons.

There are also all Elliði scheduled matches that they are going to play in the future.

Elliði performance and form graph is a Sofascore unique algorithm that we are generating from the team's last 10 matches, statistics, detailed analysis and our own knowledge.

This graph may help predict future Elliði matches.

Current Elliði players

Henrik Hermannsson

The current Elliði roster, stats and player performance can be found on this page.

There are also statistics for each player in all competitions with all total played and started matches, minutes played, number of goals scored, number of cards and much more.

Elliði top scorers list is updated live during every match.

You can click on players from the roster above and see available personal information such as nationality, date of birth, height, preferred foot, position, player value, transfer history etc.
